tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MetagenomicData (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  environment VARCHAR(50),
  microbial_species VARCHAR(100),
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CommunityAnalysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID REFERENCES MetagenomicSamples(sample_id),
    species_id UUID REFERENCES MicrobialSpecies(species_id),
    abundance FLOAT,
    diversity_index FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sample_species_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    species_id INT,
    relative_abundance FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES environment_samples(sample_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES microbial_species(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_id INT,
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_method VARCHAR(50),
    result_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES sample_species_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sample (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Organism (
  organism_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organism_name VARCHAR(255),
  organism_type VARCHAR(50),
  abundance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Gene (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  gene_function VARCHAR(255),
  sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Sequence (
  sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organism_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Environment (
  environment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  environment_name VARCHAR(255),
  temperature FLOAT,
  pH FLOAT
)
